NIMU Driver API
NIMU Driver

Files

file  nimu_eth.h
 This file defines the interface applications can use when integrating the Network Interface Module Ethernet driver adaptation layer.
 

Functions

void * Osal_nimuMalloc (uint32_t num_bytes, uint32_t alignment)

Detailed Description

This file defines the interface applications can use when integrating the Network Interface Module Ethernet driver adaptation layer

Function Documentation

void Osal_nimuFree ( void *  dataPtr,
uint32_t  num_bytes 
)

============================================================================
Osal_nimuFree

brief
This API frees and restores a given memory location pointer 'dataPtr' of size 'num_bytes' to its original heap location. Frees up memory allocated using Osal_nimuMalloc ()

Parameters
[in]dataPtrPointer to the memory block to be cleaned up.
[in]num_bytesSize of the memory block to be cleaned up.
Returns

Not Applicable

void* Osal_nimuMalloc ( uint32_t  num_bytes,
uint32_t  alignment 
)

============================================================================
Osal_nimuMalloc

brief
This routine implements the memory handler for the NIMU library. The API allocates a memory block of a given size specified by input parameter 'num_bytes'.

This API should allocate memory from shared memory.

Parameters
[in]num_bytesNumber of bytes to be allocated.
Returns

Allocated block address
